item.title: The Nature of Gardening - 8 Extraordinary Veg Gardens in January 2022, by Huw Richards
item.description:
Growing vegetables and eating them in January and even all year long is possible. Are you top of it?

Thanks to Huw Richards for sharing his wisdom and knowledge! I wrote the following notes watching the video published on Huw Richards’ channel.

You can watch it using this YouTube link.

Start the journey

See here the playlist of Huw’s series.

I will take notes of these vlogs shot and produced by Huw Richards under the tag Nature of Gardening.

Stay tuned…
